entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
